named-query.name: flashing.calls.per.day
named-query.query: select count(1) as no_of_calls, CAST(call_Time AS DATE) as call_date from whp_reports.flashing_log group by call_date order by call_date desc limit 100

named-query.name: flashing.calls.per.dayofweek
named-query.query: SELECT EXTRACT(DOW FROM call_time) as day_of_week, count(1) as no_of_calls from whp_reports.flashing_log where age(call_time) < '12 mons' group by day_of_week order by day_of_week

named-query.name: adherence.calls.per.week
named-query.query: select count(1) as no_of_calls, EXTRACT(WEEK FROM start_date ) as week_of_year from whp_reports.adherence_call_log group by week_of_year order by week_of_year

named-query.name: adherence.captured.per.week
named-query.query: select sum(adherence_captured_count) as total_adherence, EXTRACT(WEEK FROM start_date ) as week_of_year from whp_reports.adherence_call_log group by week_of_year order by week_of_year

named-query.name: adherence.count.input.types
named-query.query: select count(1) input_count, status from whp_reports.patient_adherence_submission group by status

named-query.name: adherence.call.status
named-query.query: select count(1) status_count, call_status from whp_reports.adherence_call_log group by call_status

named-query.name: flashing.calls.by.provider
named-query.query: SELECT count(1) num_of_calls, provider_id from whp_reports.flashing_log group by provider_id order by num_of_calls desc

named-query.name: providerReminders.adherenceGivenAfterReminder
named-query.query: select count(1) as no_of_providers, CAST(attempt_date_time AS DATE) as call_date from whp_reports.provider_reminder_call_log where adherence_reported = 'Y' and age(attempt_date_time) < '1 mons' group by call_date order by call_date

named-query.name: providerReminders.allCalls
named-query.query: select count(1) as no_of_calls, CAST(attempt_date_time AS DATE) as attempt_date from whp_reports.provider_reminder_call_log where age(attempt_date_time) < '1 mons' group by attempt_date order by attempt_date

named-query.name: providerReminders.status.didNotReach
named-query.query: select count(1) as no_of_calls, CAST(attempt_date_time AS DATE) as attempt_date from whp_reports.provider_reminder_call_log where disconnection_type= 'NETWORK_ERROR' and attempt = 3 and age(attempt_date_time) < '1 mons' group by attempt_date order by attempt_date

named-query.name: providerReminders.status.callComplete
named-query.query: select count(1) as no_of_calls, CAST(attempt_date_time AS DATE) as attempt_date from whp_reports.provider_reminder_call_log where disconnection_type= 'CALL_COMPLETE' and age(attempt_date_time) < '1 mons' group by attempt_date order by attempt_date

named-query.name: providerReminders.status.providerHungUp
named-query.query: select count(1) as no_of_calls, CAST(attempt_date_time AS DATE) as attempt_date from whp_reports.provider_reminder_call_log where disconnection_type= 'PROVIDER_HANGUP' and age(attempt_date_time) < '1 mons' group by attempt_date order by attempt_date

named-query.name: providerReminders.status.networkError
named-query.query: select count(1) as no_of_calls, CAST(attempt_date_time AS DATE) as attempt_date from whp_reports.provider_reminder_call_log where disconnection_type= 'NETWORK_ERROR' and age(attempt_date_time) < '1 mons' group by attempt_date order by attempt_date

named-query.name: providerReminders.status.didNotAnswer
named-query.query: select count(1) as no_of_calls, CAST(attempt_date_time AS DATE) as attempt_date from whp_reports.provider_reminder_call_log where disconnection_type= 'DID_NOT_ANSWER' and age(attempt_date_time) < '1 mons' group by attempt_date order by attempt_date

named-query.name: patient.ivrAlerts.effectiveness
named-query.query: select count(distinct cl.custom_data -> 'patientId') as patient_with_ivr_calls, count(distinct patient_id) as patients_with_adherence_given, cast(date_trunc('week', attempt_date_time::timestamp) + '6 days'::interval AS DATE) as call_week_end_date from whp_reports.call_log cl left outer join whp_reports.adherence_record ar on ar.patient_id = cl.custom_data -> 'patientId' and date_trunc('week', ar.pill_date::timestamp) + '6 days'::interval = date_trunc('week', attempt_date_time::timestamp) + '6 days'::interval and ar.pill_status = 'Taken' where age(attempt_date_time) < '3 mons' group by call_week_end_date order by call_week_end_date
